channel.title: Careful Writing on Maryam Khezrzadeh
channel.description: Recent content in Careful Writing on Maryam Khezrzadeh

item.title: Why Write
item.description: I talk a lot sometimes. I may keep going on and on, to the point of annoying whoever that might be listening. I’ve noticed that my talking-too-much and my feeling-anxious are related. That is, if I have too many conversations, I generally become a more anxious version of me, and, if I’m anxious I generally talk more. It can be a devastating loop! Too Much Talk Makes me Anxious Words have a way of capturing my attention.
